        <script>
            !function (a, b, c, d, e, f){
                a.ddjskey = e;
                a.ddoptions = f || null;
                var m = b.createElement(c), n = b.getElementsByTagName(c)[0];
                m.async = 1, m.src = d, n.parentNode.insertBefore(m, n);
            }(window,

<script>
    window.userData = {
        wishlistItems: [],
        email: null,
        phone: null,
        salesforceId: null,
    };
</script>


<script type="text/javascript">
            if (!window.segmentMethods || 
            (window.segmentMethods && (!window.segmentMethods.includes('pageLoad')  ))
        ){
            document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () =>{
                window.analytics['pageLoad']({"userId":null,"email":null,"salesforceId":null,"phone":null,"breadcrumb":""});
            });
            // productViewed event is triggering both. Avoid multiple request from same method
            window.segmentMethods = window.segmentMethods ? 
                window.segmentMethods.includes('pageLoad') ? 
                    window.segmentMethods : 
                    [...window.segmentMethods, 'pageLoad'] :
                    ['pageLoad'];
        }
    </script>

    <ul role="menubar" class="c-nav__list">

<script>
    window.userData = {
        wishlistItems: [],
        email: null,
        phone: null,
        salesforceId: null,
    };
</script>


<script type="text/javascript">
            if (!window.segmentMethods || 
            (window.segmentMethods && (!window.segmentMethods.includes('pageLoad')  ))
        ){
            document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () =>{
                window.analytics['pageLoad']({"userId":null,"email":null,"salesforceId":null,"phone":null,"breadcrumb":""});
            });
            // productViewed event is triggering both. Avoid multiple request from same method
            window.segmentMethods = window.segmentMethods ? 
                window.segmentMethods.includes('pageLoad') ? 
                    window.segmentMethods : 
                    [...window.segmentMethods, 'pageLoad'] :
                    ['pageLoad'];
        }
    </script>

                                                    <div data-fixture="" data-name="description" data-format="text">
                                <p>A sweet word or initials to wear on your heart... Make your new Tomboy shirt truly unique with complimentary embroidery.&nbsp;</p>

                                                                    <li>Classic neck</li>
                                                                    <li>Straight fit</li>
                                                                    <li>Length from shoulder : 64,5 cm / 26.4 in (EU36 / UK8)</li>
                                                            </ul>
                                            </div>
                            </div>
            <div id="tab-panel-product-details" class="c-tabs__panel s-cms-product-panel" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="tab-product-details" aria-hidden="true">
                <div class="s-cms-wysiwyg">
                    <p>
                        <strong>Behind the label :</strong><br>
                                                                        100% Organic cotton - organic textile
                    </p>
                    <p>
                        Made in                        Portugal
                    </p>
                                            <div class="c-collapse u-mt-sm">
                            <button class="c-collapse__trigger js-traceability-trigger" type="button" data-component="state" data-target="js-traceability-trigger, js-traceability-panel" data-behaviour="toggle, toggle" data-state="is-active, is-open">
                                Environmental qualities product sheet                             </button>
                            <div class="c-collapse__panel js-traceability-panel" aria-expanded="false">
                                                                    <p>
                                        <strong>Traceability :</strong><br>
                                                                                                                                                                    Weaving / knitting country : Portugal<br>

                                                                                                                                                                                                        Made in : Portugal
                                    </p>
                                                                                                                                                            </div>
                        </div>
                                                                <p>
                            <strong>Care instructions to help you look after your pieces and keep them looking good for longer :</strong><br>
                            Wash at or below 30°C (synthetics cycle)
                        </p>
                                                                <p>To learn more about our care recommendations and guides, go to <strong><a href="/en/sezane-behind-the-label" target="_blank" class="u-link-unstyled">our sustainability commitments and FAQs.</a></strong></p>
                        <p>Discover our to help you with the day-to-day maintenance of our finest garments.</p>
                                    </div>
            </div>
                        <div id="tab-panel-workshops" class="c-tabs__panel s-cms-product-panel" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="tab-workshops" aria-hidden="true">
                <div class="s-cms-wysiwyg">
                                        <p>WHERE IS SÉZANE MADE?<br>
More than 2/3 of our products are produced in Europe, the rest all over the world, depending on the origin of raw materials, expertise, working conditions and production capacities. All of our workshops are audited by independent experts, in compliance with the standards we have selected (BSCI, SMETA, ICS or WCA audits).<br>
</p>
                                    </div>
            </div>
        </div>

aria-labelledby=\"tab-workshops\" aria-hidden=\"true\">\n                <div class=\"s-cms-wysiwyg\">\n                                        <p>WHERE IS S\u00c9ZANE MADE?<br \/>\nMore than 2\/3 of our products are produced in Europe, the rest all over the world, depending on the origin of raw materials, expertise, working conditions and production capacities. All of our workshops are audited by independent experts, in compliance with the standards we have selected (BSCI, SMETA, ICS or WCA audits).<br \/>\n<\/p>\n                                 <p>WHERE IS S\u00c9ZANE MADE?<br \/>\nMore than 2\/3 of our products are produced in Europe, the rest all over the world, depending on the origin of raw materials, expertise, working conditions and production capacities.                                 <p>WHERE IS S\u00c9ZANE MADE?<br \/>\nMore than 2\/3 of our products are produced in Europe, the rest all over the world, depending on the origin of raw materials,      <p>WHERE IS S\u00c9ZANE MADE?<br \/>\nMore than 2\/3 of our products are produced in Europe, the rest all over the world, depending on the origin of raw materials, expertise, working conditions and production capacities.                 <h3 class="c-size-guide__subtitle">
                    How to find your size? 
                </h3>
                <div class="u-mt-xl@sm u-mt-md u-overflow-y-auto">
                    <div class="o-grid o-grid--gutter-sm o-grid--nowrap u-flex-cross-center">
                                                    <div class="o-grid__col o-grid__col--12 o-grid__col--11@md o-grid__col--10@md-plus o-grid__col--offset-1@md o-grid__col--offset-2@md-plus u-flex u-flex-column u-flex-main-center">
                                <ol class="c-size-guide__list c-list c-list--dotless">
                                                                                                                        <li class="c-size-guide__item c-list__item">
                                                                                                    <p class="c-size-guide__subtitle">
                                                        Chest measurement 
                                                    </p>
                                                                                                                                                    Measure at the highest point 
                                                                                            </li>
                                                                                    <li class="c-size-guide__item c-list__item">
                                                                                                    <p class="c-size-guide__subtitle">
                                                        Waist measurement 
                                                    </p>
                                                                                                                                                    Measure at the narrowest point 
                                                                                            </li>
                                                                                    <li class="c-size-guide__item c-list__item">
                                                                                                    <p class="c-size-guide__subtitle">
                                                        Hip measurement 
                                                    </p>
                                                                                                                                                    Measure at the widest point 
                                                                                            </li>
                                                                                                            </ol>

<script src="https://cdn.cookielaw.org/scripttemplates/otSDKStub.js" data-document-language="true" type="text/javascript" charset="UTF-8" data-domain-script="eb35f1b7-a804-498e-9068-73bb60058fcd"></script>
<script type="text/javascript">function OptanonWrapper(){};</script>
</div><div class="acsb-trigger acsb-widget" tabindex="0" role="button"></div><script>

(function(){
try{
/** file: addSearchboxInstructions.js */
"use strict";

function addSearchboxInstructions(searchInput, announcementMessage) {
  const newSpan = createSrOnlyElement();
  newSpan.id = "instructions";
  newSpan.textContent = announcementMessage;
  searchInput.insertAdjacentElement("afterend", newSpan);
  searchInput.setAttribute("aria-describedby", "instructions");
}
/** file: applyMenuAttributes.js */
"use strict";

function applyMenuAttributes(menu) {
  menu.setAttribute("data-acsb-m-menu", "ul");
  menu.setAttribute("data-acsb-fake-menu", "true");
}
/** file: applyMenuItemAttributes.js */
"use strict";

function applyMenuItemAttributes(menuItem) {
  let {
    alternativeMenu = true
  } = arguments.length > 1 && arguments[1] !== undefined ? arguments[1] : {};
  if (alternativeMenu) {
    forceAlternativeDropdown(menuItem);
  }
  menuItem.setAttribute("role", "menuitem");
  menuItem.setAttribute("data-acsb-menu-root", "true");
  menuItem.setAttribute("data-acsb-m-menu", "li");
  menuItem.setAttribute("data-acsb-menu", "li");
  menuItem.setAttribute("data-acsb-dropdown-container", "true");
}
/** file: chatButtonAccessible.js */
"use strict";

function accessChatButton(iframe, skipLinks) {
  let chatButtonSelector = arguments.length > 2 && arguments[2] !== undefined ? arguments[2] : "";
  let chatButtonTabHandler = arguments.length > 3 ? arguments[3] : undefined;
  const iframeDocument = iframe.contentDocument || iframe.contentWindow.document;
  const chatButton = iframeDocument.querySelector("".concat(chatButtonSelector ? chatButtonSelector : "#mountHere", " button"));
  const skipLinksContainer = skipLinks.shadowRoot.querySelector(".skip-links");
  const skipLink = skipLinksContainer.querySelector("div");
  const clone = skipLink.cloneNode(true);
  const link = clone.querySelector("a");
  link.addEventListener("keydown", event => {
    if (event.key === "Enter") {
      chatButton.focus();
      chatButton.setAttribute("data-acsb-focused", "true");
      chatButton.style.borderColor = "#639af9";
    }
  });
  link.addEventListener("click", () => {
    chatButton.focus();
    chatButton.setAttribute("data-acsb-focused", "true");
    chatButton.style.borderColor = "#639af9";
  });
  if (chatButtonTabHandler) {
    chatButton.addEventListener("keydown", event => {
      if (event.code === "Tab" && !event.shiftKey) {
        event.preventDefault();
        chatButtonTabHandler();
      }
    });
  }
  link.childNodes[0].textContent = "Skip to Chat";
  link.href = chatButtonSelector ? chatButtonSelector : "#gorgias-chat-container";
  skipLinksContainer.appendChild(clone);
}
/** file: connectMenuToMenuItem.js */
"use strict";

function connectMenuToMenuItem(_ref) {
  let {
    menuItem,
    menu,
    applyWrappingMenuItem = false,
    alternativeMenu = true,
    removeOriginalMenu = true
  } = _ref;
  let currentMenuItem = menuItem;
  if (applyWrappingMenuItem) {
    currentMenuItem = wrappMenuItem(menuItem);
  }
  const clonedMenu = menu.cloneNode(true);
  currentMenuItem.appendChild(clonedMenu);
  applyMenuItemAttributes(currentMenuItem, {
    alternativeMenu
  });
  if (removeOriginalMenu) {
    menu.remove();
  }
  return clonedMenu;
}
function wrappMenuItem(menuItem) {
  const div = document.createElement("div");
  menuItem.before(div);
  const clonedMenuItem = menuItem.cloneNode(true);
  div.appendChild(clonedMenuItem);
  menuItem.remove();
  applyMenuItemAttributes(div);
  return div;
}
function forceAlternativeDropdown(listItem) {
  const fakeMenu1 = document.createElement("div");
  const fakeMenu2 = document.createElement("div");
  fakeMenu1.setAttribute("data-acsb-menu", "ul");
  fakeMenu2.setAttribute("data-acsb-menu", "ul");
  listItem.appendChild(fakeMenu1);
  listItem.appendChild(fakeMenu2);
}
/** file: createLiveRegion.js */
"use strict";

function createLiveRegion(ariaLive, container) {
  const span = document.createElement("span");
  span.className = "acsb-sr-only";
  span.setAttribute("data-acsb-force-visible", "true");
  if (ariaLive) {
    span.setAttribute("aria-live", ariaLive);
  }
  if (container) {
    container.append(span);
  }
  return span;
}
/** file: createSrOnlyElement.js */
"use strict";

function createSrOnlyElement() {
  const srOnlyElement = document.createElement("span");
  srOnlyElement.style.position = "absolute";
  srOnlyElement.style.width = "1px";
  srOnlyElement.style.height = "1px";
  srOnlyElement.style.padding = "0";
  srOnlyElement.setAttribute("data-acsb-force-visible", "true");
  srOnlyElement.style.margin = "-1px";
  srOnlyElement.style.overflow = "hidden";
  srOnlyElement.style.clip = "rect(0, 0, 0, 0)";
  srOnlyElement.style.whiteSpace = "nowrap";
  srOnlyElement.style.borderWidth = "0";
  srOnlyElement.setAttribute("data-acsb-force-visible", "true");
  return srOnlyElement;
}
/** file: forceNavigable.js */
"use strict";

function forceNavigable(element) {
  element.setAttribute("data-acsb-now-navigable", "true");
  element.setAttribute("data-acsb-navigable", "true");
  element.setAttribute("data-acsb-force-navigable", "true");
  element.setAttribute("tabindex", "0");
}
/** file: forceUnnavigable.js */
"use strict";

function forceUnnavigable(el) {
  el.setAttribute("tabindex", "-1");
  el.setAttribute("data-acsb-force-unnavigable", "true");
  el.setAttribute("data-acsb-navigable", "false");
  el.setAttribute("data-acsb-now-navigable", "false");
}
/** file: profileEnabledInterval.js */
"use strict";

function profileEnabledInterval(profile, cb) {
  let {
    interval = 1000,
    clearAfterTimeout = true,
    timeout = 15000
  } = arguments.length > 2 && arguments[2] !== undefined ? arguments[2] : {};
  const intervalId = setInterval(() => {
    var _acsbState$actions;
    const acsbState = JSON.parse(localStorage.acsbState || "{}");
    if (acsbState !== null && acsbState !== void 0 && (_acsbState$actions = acsbState.actions) !== null && _acsbState$actions !== void 0 && (_acsbState$actions = _acsbState$actions[profile]) !== null && _acsbState$actions !== void 0 && _acsbState$actions.enabled) {
      try {
        const shouldClear = cb();
        if (shouldClear) {
          clearInterval(intervalId);
        }
      } catch (error) {
        clearInterval(intervalId);
      }
    }
  }, interval);
  if (clearAfterTimeout) {
    setTimeout(() => {
      clearInterval(intervalId);
    }, timeout);
  }
}

/** file: cart-dialog.js */
(function(){
try{
"use strict";

profileEnabledInterval("accessMode", () => {
  const addToCartButton = document.querySelectorAll("[data-cart-add-product]")[2];
  if (addToCartButton) {
    const liveRegion = createLiveRegion("polite", addToCartButton.parentElement);
    const observer = new MutationObserver(mutationsList => {
      mutationsList.forEach(() => {
        if (addToCartButton.textContent.includes("Add to basket")) {
          setTimeout(() => {
            addToCartButton.focus();
            liveRegion.textContent = "Product successfully added to cart";
            setTimeout(() => {
              liveRegion.textContent = "";
            }, 3000);
          }, 1000);
        }
      });
    });
    observer.observe(addToCartButton, {
      childList: true,
      subtree: true
    });
    return true;
  }
}, {
  timeout: 60000
});
}catch(ex){}
})();

/** file: filter-control-accessibility.js */
(function(){
try{
"use strict";

profileEnabledInterval("accessMode", () => {
  const accordionTriggers = document.querySelectorAll(".c-accordion__trigger");
  if (accordionTriggers.length) {
    const observer = new MutationObserver(mutationsList => {
      mutationsList.forEach(mutation => {
        const trigger = mutation.target;
        const panel = trigger.nextElementSibling;
        if (panel) {
          const isExpanded = trigger.getAttribute("aria-expanded") === "true";
          panel.setAttribute("aria-hidden", !isExpanded);
          panel.setAttribute("data-acsb-hidden", !isExpanded);
          if (!isExpanded) {
            setTimeout(() => trigger.focus(), 0);
          }
        }
      });
    });
    accordionTriggers.forEach(trigger => {
      trigger.addEventListener("keydown", event => {
        if (event.code === "Enter" || event.code === "Space") {
          trigger.click();
        }
      });
      observer.observe(trigger, {
        attributes: true,
        attributeFilter: ["aria-expanded"]
      });
    });
    return true;
  }
});
}catch(ex){}
})();
/** file: fix-product-customization-control-accessibility-by-keyboard.js */
(function(){
try{
"use strict";

profileEnabledInterval("accessMode", () => {
  const productSwitchContainer = document.querySelector(".c-page__main form div.c-switch");
  if (!productSwitchContainer) {
    return false;
  }
  const productSwitchTriggerButton = productSwitchContainer.querySelector("button.c-switch__btn");
  const productSwitchList = productSwitchContainer.querySelector(".c-switch__list");
  let currentFocusableIndex = -1;
  (function handleEnterKeydownOnAllProductSwitchListLinks(productSwitchList) {
    if (!productSwitchList) {
      return;
    }
    productSwitchList.setAttribute("role", "navigation");
    const allListLinks = productSwitchList.querySelectorAll("a.c-switch__btn");
    allListLinks.forEach(link => {
      const linkObserver = new MutationObserver(() => {
        var _link$querySelector;
        (_link$querySelector = link.querySelector(".acsb-sr-only")) === null || _link$querySelector === void 0 || _link$querySelector.remove();
      });
      linkObserver.observe(link, {
        childList: true
      });
      link.addEventListener("keydown", event => {
        if (event.code === "Enter") {
          event.preventDefault();
          link.click();
        }
      });
    });
  })(productSwitchList);
  productSwitchContainer.addEventListener("keydown", event => {
    if (!productSwitchList) {
      return;
    }
    event.preventDefault();
    if (event.code === "Escape") {
      closeProductSwitchList(productSwitchList, productSwitchTriggerButton);
      return;
    }
    if (event.code === "Enter" || event.code === "Space") {
      event.stopImmediatePropagation();
      openProductSwitchList(productSwitchList, productSwitchTriggerButton);
      return;
    }
    const allListLinks = productSwitchList.querySelectorAll("a.c-switch__btn");
    if (event.code === "ArrowDown") {
      var _allListLinks$current;
      currentFocusableIndex = Math.min(currentFocusableIndex + 1, allListLinks.length - 1);
      (_allListLinks$current = allListLinks[currentFocusableIndex]) === null || _allListLinks$current === void 0 || _allListLinks$current.focus();
      return;
    }
    if (event.code === "ArrowUp") {
      var _allListLinks$current2;
      currentFocusableIndex = currentFocusableIndex === -1 ? allListLinks.length - 1 : Math.max(currentFocusableIndex - 1, 0);
      (_allListLinks$current2 = allListLinks[currentFocusableIndex]) === null || _allListLinks$current2 === void 0 || _allListLinks$current2.focus();
    }
  });
  return true;
});
function closeProductSwitchList(productSwitchList, productSwitchTriggerButton) {
  productSwitchList.style.removeProperty("--switch-dropdown-visibility");
  productSwitchList.style.removeProperty("--switch-dropdown-opacity");
  productSwitchList.style.removeProperty("pointer-events");
  productSwitchTriggerButton === null || productSwitchTriggerButton === void 0 || productSwitchTriggerButton.setAttribute("aria-expanded", "false");
  productSwitchTriggerButton === null || productSwitchTriggerButton === void 0 || productSwitchTriggerButton.focus();
  currentFocusableIndex = -1;
}
function openProductSwitchList(productSwitchList, productSwitchTriggerButton) {
  productSwitchTriggerButton === null || productSwitchTriggerButton === void 0 || productSwitchTriggerButton.setAttribute("aria-expanded", "true");
  productSwitchList.style.setProperty("--switch-dropdown-visibility", "visible");
  productSwitchList.style.setProperty("--switch-dropdown-opacity", "1");
  productSwitchList.style.setProperty("pointer-events", "inherit");
}
}catch(ex){}
})();

    if (!langSwitcher.hasAttribute("role")) {
      langSwitcher.setAttribute("role", "button");
    }
    langSwitcher.addEventListener("keydown", function (event) {
      if (event.code === "Enter" || event.code === "Space") {
        event.preventDefault();
        langSwitcher.click();
      }
    });
    langSwitcher.setAttribute("aria-haspopup", "dialog");
    return true;
  }

function updateSubmenuVisibility(menuLinks) {
  var _document$querySelect;
  (_document$querySelect = document.querySelectorAll(".c-nav__submenu-content ul")) === null || _document$querySelect === void 0 || _document$querySelect.forEach(item => {

      const isExpanded = link.getAttribute("aria-expanded") === "true";
      Object.assign(submenu.style, {
        display: isExpanded ? "block" : "none",
        visibility: isExpanded ? "visible" : "hidden",
        opacity: isExpanded ? "1" : "0",
        transition: "opacity 0.3s ease-in-out"
      });
      submenu.setAttribute("aria-hidden", !isExpanded);
      if (isExpanded) {
        var _submenu$querySelecto;
        (_submenu$querySelecto = submenu.querySelector("a, button")) === null || _submenu$querySelecto === void 0 || _submenu$querySelecto.focus();
      }
    }
  });

    var _submenu$previousElem;

  });
}
document.addEventListener("keydown", function escHandler(event) {
  if (event.key === "Escape") {
    const openMenu = document.querySelector('[aria-expanded="true"]');
    if (openMenu) {
      var _openMenu$parentEleme;
      const submenu = (_openMenu$parentEleme = openMenu.parentElement) === null || _openMenu$parentEleme === void 0 ? void 0 : _openMenu$parentEleme.nextElementSibling;

        openMenu.setAttribute("aria-expanded", "false");
        submenu.setAttribute("aria-hidden", "true");
        Object.assign(submenu.style, {
          display: "none",
          visibility: "hidden",
          opacity: "0"
        });
        requestAnimationFrame(() => {
          updateSubmenuVisibility(document.querySelectorAll(".c-nav__link.c-link--tertiary.c-link--start"));
          openMenu.focus();
        });
      }
    }
  }
});

  const menuLinks = document.querySelectorAll(".c-nav__link.c-link--tertiary.c-link--start");
  if (menuLinks.length) {
    requestAnimationFrame(() => {
      menuLinks.forEach(link => {
        var _link$parentElement2;
        const submenu = (_link$parentElement2 = link.parentElement) === null || _link$parentElement2 === void 0 ? void 0 : _link$parentElement2.nextElementSibling;
        if (submenu) {
          submenu.addEventListener("mouseenter", () => {
            link.setAttribute("aria-expanded", "true");
            updateSubmenuVisibility(menuLinks);
          });
          submenu.addEventListener("click", event => event.stopPropagation());
          submenu.querySelectorAll("a, button").forEach(submenuLink => {
            submenuLink.addEventListener("click", event => event.stopPropagation());

              if (event.code === "Enter" || event.code === "Space") {
                event.preventDefault();
                submenuLink.click();
              }
            });
          });
        }

                link.setAttribute("aria-expanded", "false");
              }
            }
          });
          updateSubmenuVisibility(menuLinks);
        }
      });

          updateSubmenuVisibility(menuLinks);

      });
      menuLinks.forEach(link => observer.observe(link, {

      }));
    });
